text: Thomas James Kinsman (March 4, 1945 – May 15, 2017) was a United States Army soldier. He was known for being the recipient of the United States military's highest decoration—the Medal of Honor—for his actions in the Vietnam War. Kinsman died on May 15, 2017 in Toledo, Washington at the age of 72. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1945 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Medal of Honor recipients Category:Purple Heart recipients Category:Military people from Washington (state)
title: Thomas James Kinsman
